mapper.select: select id,bid,uid,createtime from ims_ewei_shop_sns_board_follow where bid = #{bid} and uid =#{uid}
select b.id,b.cid,b.title,b.logo,b.banner from ims_ewei_shop_sns_board_follow bf LEFT JOIN ims_ewei_shop_sns_board b on bf.bid =b.id where bf.uid =#{uid}
mapper.delete: delete from ims_ewei_shop_sns_board_follow where bid = #{bid} and uid = #{uid}
mapper.select: select m.id,m.realname,m.avatar,m.nickname,m.level,b.levelname from ims_ewei_shop_member m LEFT JOIN ims_ewei_shop_member_level b ON m.level = b.level where m.zhuquanzi =#{zhuquanzi} order by m.level asc

select b.id,b.cid,b.title,b.logo,b.banner,(select count(*) from ims_ewei_shop_sns_post p where p.bid =b.id ) topic from ims_ewei_shop_sns_board b where b.id not in(select bf.bid from ims_ewei_shop_sns_board_follow bf where bf.uid=#{uid}) order by topic desc
